channel.title: CVE Feed for checkpoint -- ZoneAlarm Extreme Security NextGen, Identity Agent for Windows, Identity Agent for Windows Terminal Server
channel.description: The latest CVEs for checkpoint -- ZoneAlarm Extreme Security NextGen, Identity Agent for Windows, Identity Agent for Windows Terminal Server

item.title: CVE-2024-24910|2024-04-18T17:35:42.688Z -- checkpoint -- zonealarm%20extreme%20security%20nextgen%2C%20identity%20agent%20for%20windows%2C%20identity%20agent%20for%20windows%20terminal%20server
item.description: A local attacker can escalate privileges on affected Check Point ZoneAlarm Extreme Security NextGen, Identity Agent for Windows, and Identity Agent for Windows Terminal Server. To exploit this vulnerability, an attacker must first obtain the ability to execute local privileged code on the target system.
